about.title: About us
content: We are a team of programmers and artists established as a work cooperative, dedicated to the development of quality, reliable and dynamic interactive systems.
Collaborative work and a form of horizontal and democratic organization enhance creative and professional processes, allowing us to obtain excellent results in each project.
We seek to profile ourselves as cultural actors in the digital field and contribute with our work and experience to the development of our community.

portfolio.title: Our work
portfolio.content: Web developments, web apps, games, custom developments, training, e-commerce, animations, advice, own projects, exhibitions, workshops.

contact.title: Get in touch
content: We are prepared to help you do it.
contact.contentQR: Discover the QR code and schedule us on your phone.

companyAddress: Wenceslao de Tata 4561 2C, Caseros, Province of Buenos Aires
